content:
Just for stimulating ideas and discussions I added to the HL7 Europe confluence space these two pages:

  • https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HEU/Ideas+for+collaboration
  • https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HEU/EU+FHIR+landscape
added a page for collecting FHIR-related infos about the EC funded projects (I started with those I know..) https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HEU/EC+funded+projects
I'll make sure the european project that I'm about to join will be added as soon as it is certain ;)
Thanks @Jens Villadsen and @Oliver Egger for updating the EU FHIR landscape page
@Espen Stranger Seland have a look ;)
thanks @Jose Costa Teixeira for the update
:point_up: @Alexander Henket @Ben McAlister @Thomas Tveit Rosenlund Might be relevant for you.
